name: interrogatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that expresses doubt about the value or truth of something, or that shows you want an answer from someone: The man looked up interrogatively from the newspaper he was reading. "There’s bad news, too, for your friend," said the manager half sympathetically, half interrogatively. Synonym
questioningly
More examplesFewer examplesAfter a moment or two he sat down and regarded her interrogatively."Is the wine any good?" he glanced interrogatively at my bottle. I looked at her interrogatively and she looked away.
